title: Warlock Spells
content:
On Save: Targets still take half damage.

Inflicts Charmed (10)

Charm a humanoid to prevent it from attacking you. You gain Advantage on Charisma Checks in dialogue.

Inflicts Command: Halt (1)

Command a creature to flee, move closer, freeze, drop to the ground or drop its weapon.

Dissonant Whispers

Inflicts Frightened (2)

Frighten a creature: it will be easier to hit and cannot move.

On Save: Target still takes half damage.

Expeditious Retreat

Gain Dash immediately and as a bonus actio
